body.name: Thayers Blemish Clearing Salicylic Acid and Witch Hazel Acne Face Moisturizer, 4 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 27 - March 1. Order within 8 hrs 17 mins.
FREE delivery February 26 - 29 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Powerful Face Acne Treatment: Face moisturizer formulated leave skin feeling renewed, soothed and hydrated. This daily facial moisturizer and night cream features maximum strength 2 percent Salicylic Acid to help clear acne blemishes, blackheads and whiteheads and helps prevent new ones from forming.

Finest Natural Ingredients: This alcohol free and fragrance free moisturizer is made with certified organic Witch Hazel grown exclusively for Thayers on a family farm in Connecticut, certified organic Aloe Vera, Tea Tree Oil, and Lemongrass Extract

Unique Formulation: Thayers Witch Hazel extract in this face cream is made the old-fashioned way (via maceration) using water only and NEVER touching alcohol. Face cream for men and face cream for women.

Time Tested Remedies: We're committed to excellence with our face lotion formulas, featuring classic ingredients we've used for nearly two centuries; Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations, once you use them, you'll know why.with our formulas, featuring classic ingredients we've used for nearly two centuries; Thayers elixirs have been a fixture in medecine cabinets for generations, once you use them, you'll know why
Cruelty Free and Sustainable: Thayers Acne moisturizer is 100% cruelty free and free of any animal ingredients, and we aim to reduce waste by offering recyclable packaging
body.description: Blemishes begone! Thayers Blemish Clearing Salicylic Acid and Witch Hazel Acne Face Moisturizer is alcohol-free and leaves skin feeling renewed, soothed and hydrated after using this face cream. A maximum strength 2 percent salicylic acid acne treatment, our formula helps clear acne blemishes, blackheads and whiteheads and helps prevent new ones from forming. This facial moisturizer is formulated with Tea Tree Oil and Thayers proprietary blend of Aloe Vera and non-distilled Witch Hazel that is grown exclusively for Thayers on a family farm in Fairfield County, Connecticut. Thayers products have been a fixture in medicine cabinets for generations- once you use them you'll know why.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect product and delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: saw a big difference as I break out alot during the winter cause my skin gets super dry so it definitely works well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is super hydrating but lightweight. I don't think it helps prevent future breakouts.
reviews.reviewText: This is a lightweight yet super hydrating, refreshing balm. It does hace salicylic acid, which helps fight and prevent future breakouts, but I didn't notice a significant impact on my adult acne. I still believe it is a great product for oily skin since it doesn't clog your pores and gives you a superb hydration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my young teen
reviews.reviewText: This is a great treatment for those early teen acne outbreaks. It is gentle on their still delicate skin and effective in clearing up breakouts quickly. My 14yr old saw that it clears them up in just 2 days compared to a competitor’s product that took 5 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: my favorite stuff! i got this and the toner it gives your face the best glow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Its a nice moisturizer but it does not perform the way I like on my skin. It didn't stop my break outs and I won't purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The missing link!
reviews.reviewText: This balm is like a leave in conditioner for your face! If you ever wash and tone your face just to find that it's dry or super oily again after an hour, this is the product for you! I can't believe the difference that adding this has made for me. Also, you only need a VERY small amount to apply a thin layer of balm to your face. The bottle is well designed (stands on its cap) and is filled to the brim so it will last forever. WELL worth the price and you should try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smooth non greasy moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Once I've shaved, I use the Which hazel facial toner. After I'm dressed and the toner has done it's thing, I put a dollop of the balm on my palm and apply all over my face and neck. Nice smooth non greasy feel that softens the skin and soothes the shaved area. Subtle scent that doesn't overpower. Will buy gain.
